overview: Youngju and Jaesik are enjoying a happy married life. One day, Eun-ju, a college junior, comes to their house and stays with them for a while. When her wife, Yeong-ju, goes to work, and Jae-sik, who writes and works from home, is left alone, Eun-joo begins a persistent and daring seduction for her usual favorite, Jae-seok. Will Jae-sik be able to withstand the temptation of Eun-ju?
title: Affair: wife's younger sister
